metadata.name: FRIBIT 1α-ω
metadata.description:
FRIBIT 1α-ω polyclones are 24 replicas of FRIBIT 1. As ERC-1155 tokens, these polyclones can function concurrently as fungible and non-fungible assets. They are transportable into and useful in metaverse games. 


FRIBIT: The House of Motley Monsters.

Every FRIBIT has the power to form and rule its own colony.  
α-ω polyclones are 24 replicas of their prototypical FRIBIT. While FRIBIT prototypes are ERC-721 non-fungible assets on either Polygon or Ethereum network, polyclones are ER-1155 assets on the Ethereum network. As ERC-1155 tokens, polyclones can function concurrently as fungible and non-fungible assets. They are transportable into and useful in metaverse games. 

Depending on availability, owners of a FRIBIT prototype may receive some or all of its polyclones as rewards. However, ownership of a polyclone does not give access to its prototype.
